A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: as a die hard star was fan this film was extremely disappointing. introducing the worst character in the franchise in Holdo. Ackbar should have gone down with his ship. There is no anchor for hope and too much of a political agenda behind the script and characters. This should be a family film and Disney have really done the dirty on the franchise. Make star wars for the fans not the Oscars.
